00037 void createDefaultProperties(Session* session, bool defaultEnabled, bool haveToCreateStateProperty)
00038     throw (SessionException)
00039 {
00040     SESSION_TRY(session)
00041         session->createBool(PROPERTY_MODULE_ENABLED, "Module is enabled", defaultEnabled);
00042         if (haveToCreateStateProperty) createStateProperty(session, PROPERTY_MODULE_STATE);
00043         session->createInt(PROPERTY_MODULE_ACTIVITY_COUNTER,
00044             "Activity counter (increments for each iteration)", 0, INFO);
00045         session->setVolatile(PROPERTY_MODULE_ACTIVITY_COUNTER);
00046         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_MODULE_LAST_ITERATION_TIMER,
00047             "Duration of last iteration", RDouble::SEC, 0., INFO);
00048         session->setVolatile(PROPERTY_MODULE_LAST_ITERATION_TIMER);
00049         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_MODULE_ITERATION_DURATION_MEAN, "Duration of iterations: mean", RDouble::SEC, 0., INFO);
00050         session->setVolatile(PROPERTY_MODULE_ITERATION_DURATION_MEAN);
00051         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_MODULE_SCHEDULE_INTERVAL_MEAN, "Schedulation interval: mean", RDouble::SEC, 0., INFO);
00052         session->setVolatile(PROPERTY_MODULE_SCHEDULE_INTERVAL_MEAN);
00053     SESSION_CATCH_RETHROW(session)
00054 }
00055 
00056 void createStateProperty(Session* session, string propertyName) throw (SessionException)
00057 {
00058     ENUM_CREATE(state);
00059     ENUM_ITEM(state, STATE_INACTIVE, "Inactive", "Module is inactive");
00060     ENUM_ITEM(state, STATE_COMPUTING, "Computing", "Module is computing");
00061     ENUM_ITEM(state, STATE_FAILED, "Failed", "Module has failed computation");
00062     ENUM_ITEM(state, STATE_DONE, "Done", "Module has done its task");
00063     session->createEnum(propertyName, "Module state", state, STATE_INACTIVE, INFO);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void createRobotProperties(Session* session) throw (SessionException)
00067 {
00068     SESSION_TRY(session)
00069         session->createPose(PROPERTY_ROBOT_ODOMETRY_POSE, "Pose of robot (odometry)");
00070         session->createPose(PROPERTY_ROBOT_ESTIMATED_POSE, "Pose of robot (localization/slam estimate)");
00071         session->createPose(PROPERTY_ROBOT_TARGET_POSE, "Target pose (gotopos)", RPoint2od(0.,0.,0.));
00072     
00073         session->createStorage("RLaserData", PROPERTY_ROBOT_LASER_DATA, "Laser data");
00074         session->createStorage("RSonarData", PROPERTY_ROBOT_SONAR_DATA, "Sonar data");
00075 
00076         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_RADIUS, "Radius of robot (circular robot)", RDouble::M, 0.300);
00077         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_WIDTH, "Width of robot (y, rectangular robot)", RDouble::M, 0.400);
00078         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_HEIGHT, "Depth of robot (x, rectangular robot)", RDouble::M, 0.500);
00079         
00080         ENUM_CREATE(shapes);
00081         ENUM_ITEM(shapes, CIRCULAR, "Circular", "Circular shape (Pioneer 2)");
00082         ENUM_ITEM(shapes, RECTANGULAR, "Rectangular", "Rectangular shape (Pioneer 3AT)");
00083         session->createEnum(PROPERTY_ROBOT_SHAPE, "Shape of robot", shapes, CIRCULAR);
00084     
00085         session->createBool(PROPERTY_ROBOT_STALLED, "Robot stalled", false, INFO);
00086 
00087         ENUM_CREATE(whichStalled);
00088         ENUM_ITEM(whichStalled, NONE, "None", "No wheel stalled");
00089         ENUM_ITEM(whichStalled, LEFT, "Left", "Left wheels stalled");
00090         ENUM_ITEM(whichStalled, RIGHT, "Right", "Right wheels stalled");
00091         ENUM_ITEM(whichStalled, BOTH, "Both", "Full robot stall");
00092         session->createEnum(PROPERTY_ROBOT_WHICH_STALLED, "Which robot wheel stalled", whichStalled, NONE, INFO);
00093     
00094         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_SPEED, "Robot speed", RDouble::M_SEC, 0., INFO);
00095         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_JOG, "Robot jog", RDouble::RAD_SEC, 0., INFO);
00096         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_DESIRED_SPEED, "Robot desired speed", RDouble::M_SEC, 0., NOT_PERSISTENT);
00097         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_MAX_WHEEL_SPEED, "Maximum speed for single wheel", RDouble::M_SEC, 2 * M_PI);
00098         session->createDouble(PROPERTY_ROBOT_DESIRED_JOG, "Robot desired jog", RDouble::RAD_SEC, 0., NOT_PERSISTENT);
00099     
00100         session->createQueue(PROPERTY_ROBOT_DATA_QUEUE, "Robot data queue");
00101         session->createPose(PROPERTY_ROBOT_LASER_POSE, "Laser pose on robot", Point2od(0., 0., 0.));
00102     SESSION_CATCH_RETHROW(session)
00103 }
00104 
00105 void getRobotSizes(Session* session, double& robotMinSize, double& robotMaxSize) throw (SessionException)
00106 {
00107     Common::RobotShape robotShape =
00108         (Common::RobotShape) session->getEnum(ROBOT_PREFIX PROPERTY_ROBOT_SHAPE);
00109     if (robotShape == Common::CIRCULAR) {
00110         robotMinSize = robotMaxSize = session->getDouble(ROBOT_PREFIX PROPERTY_ROBOT_RADIUS) * 2;
00111     }
00112     else {
00113         double robotWidth = session->getDouble(ROBOT_PREFIX PROPERTY_ROBOT_WIDTH);
00114         double robotHeight = session->getDouble(ROBOT_PREFIX PROPERTY_ROBOT_HEIGHT);
00115         robotMinSize = (robotWidth < robotHeight ? robotWidth : robotHeight);
00116         robotMaxSize = (robotWidth > robotHeight ? robotWidth : robotHeight);
00117     }
00118 }
